knimeNode.name: Workflow Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads the workflow stored in an FSKX file.

fullDescription.intro: Reads the workflow stored in an FSKX file.
fullDescription.option: Location of the FSKX file, as an absolute URL, a mount-point relative URL or a local path.

option.name: Load the Workflow as meta node

fullDescription.option: If checked, the workflow stored in an FSKX file will be loaded into the host workflow as metanode and can be edited before execution. Otherwise the Workflow Reader will execute the workflow from the file in headless mode and expose the output.
